reviews.reviewText: Excellent shipment - batteries came in perfect condition....so pleased with the entire order.

reviews.name: Rayovac Hearing Aid Batteries, Size 312, 4 count
reviews.reviewText: I received my order promptly. I also appreciate the auto ship option since I need to buy these batteries periodically.
reviews.title: Prompt delivery

reviews.name: Rayovac Hearing Aid Batteries, Size 312, 4 count
reviews.reviewText: I have enjoyed the home delivery. Being a disabled person this has given me one thing I do not have to worry about in this busy world we live in. One other thing my first delivery you had a notion about letting the battery activate before use I find I don't have bad battery anymore. Thank You, Nancy
reviews.title: Nancy
